mapper.select: select o.id, o.name, o.totalprice, o.createDate, o.createBy, c.cname as carid, o.description, o.stage from orderform o join car c on c.cid=o.carid where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:

#{carid}, #{description}, #{stage} )
